sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useParams, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import './trailer.css' export default function Trailer(props) { const titre = useParams().id const location = useLocation() console.log(location) console.log(location.state.titre) return (

{titre} {location.state.rate}/10

Summary

{location.state.desc}
) }
